content: Will the data collected with this app contribute to the *public* research on the spread of COVID-19? If not, it would be more helpful if people used the "COVID Symptom Tracker" app which helps NHS and academic researchers track the spread of the virus. Unless this is coordinating with those public studies, the data can't be combined, and risks reducing the uptake in the main study. Please coordinate (with documentation) or direct your users to the right place to track the virus. Concerning the app itself: Having come to this app based on an email about tracking COVID-19, I was surprised by how the COVID-19 information is not easy to find in the app. The app also hung up on me the first time I tried it. It also doesn't give much more information on GP records (which has always been very limited) than I can get from your web site.
replyContent:
Hi Tim, We are working with both Manchester University and the University of Liverpool in regards to covid-19 and we will continue to update our findings on our website.
If there is anything else we can help with please speak to a member of our Customer Support Team at hello@evergreen-life.co.uk or call us-01617686063.
